personal.name: YOUR_NAME
personal.title: Full Stack Developer | Cloud | DevOps | AI
personal.tagline: I architect scalable systems, automate everything, and build intelligent solutions powered by modern AI.
personal.intro: Passionate about building robust backend systems, deploying on cloud infrastructure, and integrating cutting-edge AI into real-world products. I turn complex problems into elegant, automated solutions.
personal.about: I'm a full-stack engineer with deep expertise in backend development, cloud architecture, and AI integration. With a strong foundation in Python, Django, and Node.js, I design systems that are scalable, maintainable, and production-ready. My DevOps mindset means everything I build is containerized, version-controlled, and deployed through automated CI/CD pipelines on AWS and GCP. I'm equally passionate about AI — I actively integrate LLMs, agents, and automation workflows into real projects to solve meaningful problems faster and smarter.

pipeline.title: Code Push
pipeline.description: Developer pushes code to GitHub repository. Branch protection rules ensure code review before merging to main.

pipeline.title: Actions Trigger
pipeline.description: GitHub Actions workflow is triggered automatically on push or pull request events to the main branch.

pipeline.title: Build & Test
pipeline.description: Automated tests run, linting checks execute, and the application is built. Failures block the pipeline immediately.

pipeline.title: Docker Image
pipeline.description: A production Docker image is built and pushed to Amazon ECR (Elastic Container Registry) with version tagging.

pipeline.title: Deploy to AWS
pipeline.description: The new image is deployed to AWS ECS/EC2 with zero-downtime rolling updates and CloudWatch monitoring enabled.

ai.summary: I actively integrate AI into real-world projects — from building RAG pipelines with LangChain and vector databases to deploying AI agents that automate complex workflows. AI isn't a buzzword in my work; it's a force multiplier.
useCases: Built a RAG-powered internal knowledge bot using LangChain + Pinecone that reduced support queries by 40%.
Automated document processing pipelines using GPT-4o for classification and data extraction at scale.
Deployed AI agents that orchestrate multi-step workflows: data ingestion → transformation → notification.

projects.name: CloudOps Automation Suite
projects.description: A full-stack DevOps dashboard that provisions AWS infrastructure using Terraform and monitors services via CloudWatch. Includes alerting, auto-scaling triggers, and cost analytics.

projects.name: AI Document Intelligence
projects.description: A document processing API that uses GPT-4o to extract, classify, and summarize content from PDFs and images. Built with LangChain, deployed on AWS Lambda with S3 storage.

projects.name: RAG Knowledge Base API
projects.description: A production-ready Retrieval-Augmented Generation system with vector search (Pinecone), conversation memory, and multi-tenant support. Served via REST API with JWT auth.

projects.name: E-Commerce Microservices Platform
projects.description: Scalable e-commerce backend with separate microservices for auth, inventory, orders, and payments. CI/CD via GitHub Actions, deployed on AWS ECS with RDS and Redis caching.
